data.title: Nevada Women's Film Festival 2020
data.text:
This virtual screening is eligible for audience awards! Unlock it to cast your vote.

The film(s) in this program are on-demand. Watch at your convenience and be sure to come back for a live Q&A with the filmmakers. Q&As will be recorded in case you can’t make it

Based on true events. The story follows Amber's life falling for the wrong man who manipulates her over the years. From what appears to be a loving relationship quickly unfolds the reality of a victim unable to escape from domestic abuse. Supported by SafeLives charity.

Runtime

8 minutes

Country

United Kingdom

Director

The Bashford Twins

Screenwriter

Natasha Rose Mills

Producer

The Bashford Twins, Craig Conway

Cast

Natasha Rose Mills, Tom Benedict Knight, Chelsea Macleod, Abbie Steele, Jill Halfpenny

The film(s) in this program are on-demand. Watch at your convenience and be sure to come back for a live Q&A with the filmmakers. Q&As will be recorded in case you can’t make it
